actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Rules.

official_title: A resolution amending rule VIII of the Rules of the House of Representatives to prohibit a Member from casting any other Member's vote or recording any other Member's presence, and for other purposes.

summary.text: Amends the rules of the House of Representatives to prohibit Members from authorizing any other individual or any other Member to cast their votes or record their presence in the House or Committee of the Whole.

titles.title: A resolution amending rule VIII of the Rules of the House of Representatives to prohibit a Member from casting any other Member's vote or recording any other Member's presence, and for other purposes.
